description: MindMapX allows iPad and iPhone users to create simple, line-based diagrams that map out their ideas about a topic. These mindmaps can include different-colored branching lines and text typed above those lines. For example, a user could use MindMapX to brainstorm and document a variety of ideas for their next New Year's Resolution(s).
Users can save and share their MindMapX mindmaps as .PNG files or MMX files. Saving a mindmap as an MMX file allows the user (or anyone with which they share the file) to continue editing it.
